About Me

Hi, I’m Kanak.
Unlocked a country-locked-second-hand mobile broadband modem in my early teenage, following some crack-the-heck docs. Been in love with reading documentations to make and break stuffs since then.
Nowadays, I’m an avid enthusiast of software engineering, systems security and machine learning.
Besides coding, reading and implementing research papers, I love consuming books, travelling, illustrating digital art and football(the soccer one).

Software Engineer,

OpenRefactory, Inc.
